metadata.title: CVE-2014-9765 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Buffer overflow in the main_get_appheader function in xdelta3-main.h inxdelta3 before 3.0.9 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code viaa crafted input file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9765` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

xdelta3 - 3.0.7-dfsg-2ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xdelta3 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.0.7-dfsg-2ubuntu0.2').
